account-setup.backup-seed-widget.text-1: Your recovery phrase is crucial to ensure the safety of your wallet. In this step, we’ll provide you with a unique, 24 word recovery phrase which you’ll need to copy onto a piece of paper and save in a safe place.
account-setup.backup-seed-widget.text-2: You may use the recovery phrase in the event that you ever lose your access link or forget your password.
account-setup.backup-seed-widget.text-3: You may also view your private key.
account-setup.kyc-widget-text: The verification process is necessary to prove the legal status of your company.
account-setup.pending-kyc.text: Thank you for submitting your identity verification request! We will review your documents within 1 business day and contact you if we require further information. Otherwise, we will notify you by email once your account has been successfully verified. To contact support, please click here.
account-setup.pending-kyc.title: Account verification
account-setup.verify-email-widget.text-1: Please check your inbox to verify your email address. We sent a verification email with a unique access link to your email address:
account-setup.verify-email-widget.text-2: If you didn’t receive an email, remember to check your spam folder
bank-transfer-flow.failed-to-start: We are unable to initiate bank transfer. Please contact with support.
bank-transfer.purchase.success.text: Thank you for your wire transfer, the nEUR purchase takes around 1 to 3 business days. For your convenience we will sent you an email once your request was processed and your account will be credited.
bank-transfer.purchase.summary.descripti:
To get nEUR to your wallet please proceed to your bank and complete the wire transfer using the bank details below. Your wire transfer details must include the reference number and your name in order to match it to your Neufund wallet.

To limit bank fees, we recommend sending funds in EUR.
bank-transfer.purchase.summary.note: Please note that the nEUR purchase takes around 1 to 3 business days. For your convenience will send you an email with the transaction summary.
bank-transfer.purchase.summary.title: PURCHASE neur
bank-transfer.redeem.init.description: To return your nEUR tokens we will use your verified bank account. The nEUR tokens will be returned to Quintessence PLC and you will receive EUR.
bank-transfer.redeem.init.errors.value-h: The amount exceeds your wallet balance
bank-transfer.redeem.init.errors.value-l: Redeem amount should be {minAmount} EUR or more
bank-transfer.redeem.init.note: It may take between 4-6 business days to complete the transaction. Your bank may charge you additional fees for incoming transfers.
bank-transfer.redeem.init.redeem-fee.too: When you redeem nEUR, a {fee}% transaction fee is charged by our banking partner. This fee will be deducted from the amount you've requested to redeem.
bank-transfer.redeem.init.title: REDEEM NEUR
bank-transfer.redeem.success.explanation: Your transaction has been confirmed by the Ethereum network and your funds are on the way to your bank account within 4 to 6 business days.
bank-transfer.redeem.summary.note: It may take between 4-6 business days to complete the transaction. Your bank may charge you additional fees for incoming transfers.
bank-transfer.redeem.summary.title: REDEEM NEUR summary
bank-transfer.redeem.title: REDEEM NEUR
bank-transfer.verify.summary.description: To link your bank account proceed to your bank and complete the wire transfer using the bank details below. Your wire transfer details must include the reference number and your name in order to match it to your Neufund wallet. To avoid unnecessary bank fees we recommend sending funds in EUR.
bank-transfer.verify.summary.note: Please note that the bank account verification takes around 1 to 3 business days. For your convenience will send you an email with the transaction summary.
bank-transfer.verify.summary.title: Link you bank account via bank transfer
bank-verification.agreement.neur-purchas: I agree to the terms of the nEUR Purchase Agreement
bank-verification.agreement.note: NOTE: nEUR tokens may only be used on Neufund platform and only to acquire equity tokens or payout of proceeds by the investments on the platform. nEUR tokens cannot be exchanged between holders.
bank-verification.agreement.terms-and-co: I agree with the Terms and Conditions
bank-verification.agreement.text: Neufund has partnered with Quintessence PLC for the issuance of the nEUR token. Quintessence PLC operates a blockchain-based technology that provides for the purchase of nEUR tokens for a specific amount of EUR. To purchase nEUR tokens you agree to the terms of the nEUR Purchase Agreement.
bank-verification.agreement.title: nEUR token Partner
bank-verification.info.text: In order to receive your funds, we need to first link your bank account. In the next step, we'll ask you to initiate a SEPA transfer of {min} using a bank account matching your verified identity. Once we've received the transfer, your bank account will be linked to your profile and used for future redeem requests.
bank-verification.info.title: Link your bank account
bank-verification.success.text: Thank you for your wire transfer, the bank account verification takes around 1 to 3 business days. For your convenience we have sent you an email once your request was processed and your account verifed.
check-your-icbm-wallet-widget.notice: This tool is solely for those who committed funds during the ICBM using an unsupported wallet. Please enter your ICBM wallet address in the field below to begin the migration process.
Private Key is saved in your clipboard
This your wallet's private key. Do not share this information with anyone. Your key is displayed here so that you may connect your Light Wallet to external browser wallet interfaces (e.g., MetaMask).
components.wallet-selector.wallet-recove:
A new access link has been sent to your email.
Please save this link.
You will need it to access your account.
You have successfully created a new password!
critical-error.heading: Oops… it looks like something is broken!
critical-error.paragraph: Our engineers have been notified and we are working to fix this as soon as possible. In the meantime, please try refreshing your browser.
dashboard.could-not-load-etos: Could not load ETO's list. Please try again later.
dashboard.eto-opportunities.description: Below, you’ll find all available investment opportunities on the platform. Here, you can check on the status and view important information about each offering. Click anywhere within the box and you’ll be redirected to its listing page for more details.
dashboard.incoming-payout-widget.wallet-: To participate in payout from NEU, make sure you store all NEU tokens on the wallet associated with your Neufund account.
dashboard.my-portfolio-widget.explanatio: From the dashboard, you can check your wallet balances and view available investment opportunities.
dashboard.name: Dashboard
documents.approved-prospectus-and-agreem: Upload section for your approved or signed documents
documents.drag-n-drop: Drag and drop or Click to upload high quality PDF
documents.legal-documents.description: In this section, you can manage all your legal agreements and documents for your ETO. In the first section, we generate for you agreements based on the date you enter into the ETO forms. You can download them as word files, review, adjust and upload signed versions in the second section below. The second section navigates you through the order of documents that need to be uploaded.
documents.please-fill-the-eto-forms-in-o: Please fill the ETO forms in order to generate templates
download-agreement-widget.sign-again-tex: You re-uploaded investment agreement. Now you need to announce and confirm it on Ethereum again.
download-agreement-widget.sign-on-ethere: Now when you uploaded your signed Investment Agreement, it's time to announce and confirm your signature on Ethereum. Only then Nominee will be notified and able to verify and provide his/her own signature.
This is the final step! Announced agreements can only be confirmed by the nominee. Click below to sign the agreement on Ethereum.
download-agreement-widget.signing-text: We’ve updated the investment summary for you. Please download it from the document section and update your Investment and Shareholder Agreement. Make sure to use the correct data presented in the investment summary. To upload your signed Investment and Shareholders Agreement go to Documents section. By uploading your signed ISHA you will be able to withdraw collected funds.
download-agreement-widget.success-text: Your ETO completed successfully. You may now withdraw the funds you have collected. To do so go to your wallet.
download-agreement-widget.wait-for-nomin: Waiting for Nominee to confirm your signature
Nominee was informed that you signed Investment Agreement on-chain. Nominee will review signed document, verify its content and signatures and then confirm on-chain. Please wait...
error-boundary.widget-error-message: There was an error while loading this widget

error-message.browser-wallet.wallet-conn: Please connect your wallet to the "Main Ethereum Network" by selecting from the "Networks" drop-down menu in MetaMask.
error-message.browser-wallet.wallet-lock: Your wallet seems to be locked — we can't access any accounts
error-message.browser-wallet.wallet-not-: Please check if the MetaMask extension is enabled in your browser. We were unable to detect any wallet.
error-message.eth-address-validation.ill: characters after "0x" can only include letters a—f, A—F and numbers
error-message.eth-address-validation.inv: A valid ETH address can only begin with a "0x"
error-message.eth-address-validation.max: A valid ETH address can only have 40 characters after "0x"
error-message.eth-address-validation.not: this is not a valid ETH address
error-message.gnosis-wallet.wallet-not-e: Please check if the Gnosis (NeuFund) extension is enabled in your browser and this website is added to whitelist. We were unable to detect the wallet.
error-message.ledger.contract-disabled: Please enable Contract Support on your Ledger
error-message.ledger.generic-error: Ledger Nano S is not available
error-message.ledger.ledger-locked: Please unlock your Ledger Nano S by entering your PIN code on the device.
error-message.ledger.ledger-not-supporte: Your Ledger Nano firmware is unsupported
error-message.light-wallet.deserialize: There was a problem with Vault retrieval
error-message.light-wallet.encryption-er: There was a problem with Light Wallet encryption
error-message.light-wallet.wrong-mnemoni: Something went wrong. Please enter your 24 word recovery and try again.
error-message.light-wallet.wrong-passwor: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

eto-bookbuilding-widget.button-disabled: Whitelisting is not available at this point.
eto-dashboard.company-informations: Fill in information about your company
eto-dashboard.listing-review.description: Thank you for submitting your listing page. Someone from our team will review and coordinate with you the publishing time of your listing page. By publishing your listing page you can start referring investors to it.
eto-dashboard.review.description: Thank you for submitting your listing page. Someone from our team will review and coordinate with you the publishing time of your listing page. By publishing your listing page you can start referring investors to it.
eto-dashboard.setup-eto.description: You can now configure your investment offer. Please fill out all ETO settings. After that you will be asked to link your nominee and upload a signed term sheet. This will allow you to publish your investment offer.
eto-dashboard.tooltip.description:
This is your dashboard which will guide you through the process of setting up your ETO. Below you see the so-called ETO forms which categorize all the necessary information for a beautiful, transparent and fully regulated fundraising.

All the information provided in these forms will be visible on your companies listing page. Preview this page before publishing it by navigating to “ETO Page” using the main menu.

You don’t have to fill out your profile in one go. You can save the process and return later to make additions or edits. After submitting your listing page for publishing you will still be able to update all marketing information and assets.

eto-nominee.permissions.delete-nominee-r: Please use your wallet to confirm nominee rejection.
eto-overview-thumbnail.presale.days-to-p: {endDate} to go until public eto starts
eto-overview.campaigning.whitelist-statu:
The whitelist is available to a limited number of investors on a first come first serve basis. Whitelist participation grants investors access to the typically more favorable investment terms of the presale.

Please note that the whitelist is merely for informational purposes. It does not create any legally binding obligation for you. Accordingly, you are not bound to your whitelist commitment and may change your commitment at any time. However, if your whitelist commitment is at any point changed to 0, you will be removed from the whitelist and unable to access the investment terms of the pre-sale.
eto-overview.cover-banner.go-to-investor: This listing page might differ from what your investors see. View page as an investor
eto-overview.cover-banner.jurisdiction.d: This offering is listed under German jurisdiction
eto-overview.cover-banner.jurisdiction.l: This offering is listed under Liechtenstein jurisdiction

icbm-help-modal.paragraph:
• Metamask
  • Parity
  • Mist
  • Ledger Nano S
If you committed to our ICBM using one of the above wallets, please register on the platform with the same wallet.

Did you commit to our ICBM with a different wallet? If so, you’ll need to create a new wallet from the list above and use the Migration Tool to migrate your commitment to your new wallet.
icbm-help-modal.title: Neufund supports the following wallets:
icbm-wallet.tooltip: The Initial Capital Building Mechanism (ICBM) was a one-time event that took place from 17 November — 17 December 2017, where investors were rewarded with NEU in exchange for putting aside ETH and committing to invest it in ETOs on Neufund.
identity.modal.description:
Your Identity is now stored on the blockchain.

Once you have been successfully verified, a claim indicating such is stored directly on the blockchain. This serves two important purposes: the claim is stored securely and is immutable, while your identity remain unexposed.
investment-agreement.title: Investment Agreement
investment-flow.amount-exceeds-investmen: Due to transaction costs this amount exceeds your investment limit.
investment-flow.amount-to-invest: Please enter the amount you want to invest
investment-flow.error-message.above-maxi: The amount is above the maximum ticket size of {maxAmount}
investment-flow.error-message.below-mini: The amount is below the minimum ticket size of {minAmount}
investment-flow.error-message.exceeds-to: The amount exceeds the amount of {tokenName} Tokens left in the sale, please reduce the investment
investment-flow.error-message.exceeds-wa: The amount exceeds your wallet balance
investment-flow.message.no-icbm-neu-rewa: If you are using your ICBM wallet to invest, you won’t receive additional NEU for this investment.
investment-flow.see-your-portfolio-for-d: See your portfolio for more details
investment-flow.select-wallet-and-curren: Select which balances you would like to use
investment-flow.success.congratulation-t: Congratulations! Your investment transaction has been confirmed. You can view your transaction on {etherscan}. We will notify you when you can claim your Equity Tokens.
investment-flow.success.title: Success! Your Investment is confirmed
investment-flow.title: Investment
investment-flow.you-already-invested: You already invested in this ETO. The current investment will be added to your previous one.
investor-payout.accept.name: Payout Accept
investor-payout.accept.success.text: Success! Your transaction is completed. Your wallet balance has been updated with this accepted payout.
Please find below a summary of the payout you will receive as a NEU token holder. Once you accept this payout, it will automatically become available in your wallet balance. You will be free to use it for further investments or  withdraw it. For reference we have attached your NEU token holder agreement.
investor-payout.accept.summary.single.de: Please find below a summary of the {token} payout you will receive as a NEU Token Holder. Once you accept this payout, it will automatically become available in your {token} wallet balance. You will be free to use it for further investments or redeem it outside the Platform. For reference we have attached your NEU Token Holder agreement.
investor-payout.accept.summary.title: ACCEPT payout from NEU
investor-payout.redistribute.confirm.tex: As a NEU token holder, you are entitled to payouts after each successful ETO. If you choose to redistribute, you agree that your current payout will be automatically redistributed to all other NEU token holders.
investor-payout.redistribute.name: Payout Redistribute
investor-payout.redistribute.success.tex: Thank you, your transaction is completed. You have rejected your current NEU payout and the proceeds will be automatically distributed to all other NEU token holders. Your pending payouts have been updated.
investor-payout.redistribute.summary.des: By clicking redistribute, you agree to forfeit the amount displayed below. Your current payout will be automatically redistributed to all other NEU token holders. For reference, we have attached your NEU Token Holder Agreement.
investor-payout.summary.hint: To process this payout we will need to trigger and ethereum transaction which will incur gas costs. This will be deducted from your ETH wallet.
ipfs-failed-to-download-file: Failed to download file from IPFS
jurisdiction-disclaimer.text: This offering is not available to {jurisdiction} residents.{breakingLine}Are you a resident of {jurisdiction}?
kyc.business.beneficial-owner.beneficial: Are there any beneficial owners of this company? Someone qualifies as such if they hold more than 25% of a company's shares. If there is a beneficial owner, please fill in the following details. If you are the only owner of the company, you do not need to add your entry here.
kyc.business.beneficial-owner.label: Beneficial Owner {id}
kyc.business.business-data.description: Please complete the information below about your company.
kyc.business.business-data.upload-docume: As part of the identity verification process, we ask that you upload supporting documents. Below are some examples of documents that are required depending on the type of entity.
kyc.business.legal-representative.descri: Please complete the information below for the entity’s legal representative. The legal representative is the person who is authorized to manage the entity’s Neufund account.
kyc.business.legal-representative.pep: Are you a Politically Exposed Person?
kyc.disclaimer.contents: By providing your information and clicking “Continue” you are consenting to your data being processed. Your personal information is always kept confidential, we never share it with anyone.
kyc.modal.submit-description: Please confirm that you would like to submit this verification request.
kyc.modal.verification.description: We will review your documents within 1 business day and contact you if we require further information. Otherwise, we will notify you by email once your account has been successfully verified.
kyc.modal.verification.title: Thank you for submitting your identity verification request!
kyc.personal.high-income: Is your income above 5.000 EUR monthly, or do you have more than 100.000 EUR of assets available?
kyc.personal.income.disclaimer: The German Federal Financial Supervisory Authority requires us to ensure that our clients invest within their means
kyc.personal.instant-id.description: Video Verification (via IDnow): By selecting video verification, you will be redirected to our verification partner IDnow where an agent will verify your identity and address during a short video call. You may complete this process via your computer or mobile phone. The verification results will be presented to you shortly after the call is completed.
kyc.personal.instant-id.manual-verificat: Manual Verification: By selecting manual verification, you will be asked to upload clear color copies of your proof of identity and proof of address. One of our KYC representatives will review your documents and contact you within 1 business day.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.disclai: You will be asked to provide more details about your situation at a later stage.
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.questio: Are you a Politically Exposed Person?
kyc.personal.politically-exposed.tooltip:
Politically Exposed Person means a natural person who is or who has been entrusted with prominent public functions and includes the following:

  • heads of State, heads of government, ministers and deputy or assistant ministers
  • members of parliament or of similar legislative bodies
  • members of the governing bodies of political parties
kyc.personal.uploadId.description: Only one more step to go! Please upload your proof of identity and proof of address as per the instructions below:
kyc.personal.us-citizen.disclaimer: Due to regulatory uncertainties in the US we can currently not accept any US American citizens. Since US law also operates outside of its geographical borders we cannot make an exception even if you are based overseas
kyc.personal.us-citizen.question: Are you a US citizen?
kyc.request-state.accepted.description: Your Verification Process request was approved
kyc.request-state.accepted.title: Verification Process request approved
kyc.request-state.outsourced.description: If you're not automatically forwarded to idNow, please click the link below to continue.
kyc.request-state.outsourced.title: Instant identification started
kyc.request-state.pending.description: Thank you for submitting your identity verification request! We will review your documents within 1 business day and contact you if we require further information. Otherwise, we will notify you by email once your account has been successfully verified.

kyc.start.description:
The identity verification process helps us get to know you, and will enable a regulated investment process. Regulatory requirements dictate that we verify each new user account. This keeps our platform secure and helps prevent unlawful activity. Once your identity has been successfully verified, you’ll be able to begin investing and enjoy benefits of Neufund.

By choosing to verify a personal account, you are stating that you will invest in your own name. If you intend to invest on behalf of a legal entity, please choose the company verification option.
kyc.start.go-to-company: I am verifying a company account
kyc.start.go-to-personal: I am verifying my personal account
kyc.start.title: Start your Verification Process

modal.ipfs-eto.description: Ready to go? Once uploaded, your legal document is public and immutable which means you won’t be able to delete it. settings.book-building-widget.book-build: You have disabled your whitelist. You can re-activate your whitelist anytime. It will however be automatically disabled 2 weeks before your presale starts.

You have successfully enabled your whitelist. Investors can now signup and indicate their investments. You can disable the whitelist any time but manage it wisely - every time you disable and enable the whitelist all of Neufund’s investors will be notified. If you don’t will automatically be disabled 14 days before your presale starts.

You have 500 slots to give away. All investors signed up for the whitelist will have access to the presale of your fundraising. You can disable the subscription any time or it will be automatically disabled once full or two weeks before the start of your presale.

Below you will find the transaction data that you will need to migrate your ICBM commitment to your verified wallet. Note: You will be conducting two separate transactions during this process.

IMPORTANT:
- The migration process is intended solely for Neufund ICBM investors who wish to migrate their ICBM commitment to a verified wallet that they will use to invest in ETOs.
- During the migration process, do not close this screen. We will monitor the pending transaction and prompt you to the next step once the transaction has been confirmed.

Need help? Check out this guide to walk you through every step of the process.

For users who are migrating from MyEtherWallet:
Click the link that says ‘Open pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet’ and you will be redirected to the MyEtherWallet website in a separate tab. Check that the pre-filled information is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen prompting you to continue to Step 2.

For all other users (e.g., Trezor, imToken):
Open your ICBM wallet interface in a separate tab or window and look for the Send/Receive function on your wallet. Copy and paste the data below into the appropriate fields. Check that the information you’ve entered is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen prompting you to continue to Step 2.

For users who are migrating from MyEtherWallet:
Just as in Step 1, click the link that says ‘Open pre-loaded transaction in MyEtherWallet’ and you will be redirected to the MyEtherWallet website in a separate tab. Check that the pre-filled information is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen indicating that the migration process has been successfully completed.

For all other users (e.g., Trezor, imToken):
Return to your ICBM wallet interface in a separate tab or window and look for the Send/Receive function on your wallet. Copy and paste the data below into the appropriate fields. Check that the information you’ve entered is correct and execute the transaction.

Return to this page. Once the transaction has been confirmed, you will see a message at the bottom of your screen indicating that the migration process has been successfully completed.

shared-component.multi-file-upload.requi:
Required documents:
  • Commercial registry extract
  • Articles of association
  • Shareholder agreement (if applicable)
Depending on your entity's structure, we may require additional documents.

Please ensure that the documents you upload are high-quality, color copies.

Acceptable file types include .png, .jpg and .pdf.

Please note that you are unable to remove any documents after you’ve uploaded them.

Proof of address: This document should contain your full name, address, issue date, and should not be older than 6 months. The name or logo of the issuer should also be clearly visible. Please ensure that you scan the document against a different-colored background, so that all four corners are visible.
Note: If your government-issued ID also contains your address, you may skip this step.

Proof of Identity: This document refers to any government-issued ID / passport or driving license and should contain your name, date of birth, a clear photograph, issue date, and expiry date (if applicable).
If the document contains relevant information on both the front- and rear-facing sides, please ensure that you upload a clear and coloured copy of both sides of the document.

tx-sender.tx-pending-watching.descriptio: You have submitted transaction outside of Neufund and it still remains in the Ethereum pending pool waiting to be executed and included in new block. Neufund Platform prevents submitting more transactions if you have still pending one. In most cases this leads to unexpected problems as only one transaction with the same nonce will be mined. We'll wait until transaction specified below is mined.
